name: Long Way Home (A&M Game Studio)
description:
Main guy wakes up from the cryogenic sleep on the old space station only to be welcomed by some alien dude. How did both of them get there? And how will they survive and escape?

Language learning visual novel set in deep space. Progress with the story, learn new words and grammar, apply them immediately in various communicative situations.

You should probably do some - not a lot - duolingo to get used to the cyrillic script and memorize some essential words.

You can support us here https://boosty.to/aandm.gamestudio. There will be much more content for Slavic, Russian and Japanese language learners. We welcome everyone!
